# R Objects (II): Other Types {#r-objects-other-types}

Having mastered vectors in Chapter \@ref(r-objects), we will introduce other types of R objects, including matrix, array, data frame, and list.

```{r echo = FALSE, results = TRUE}
Type  <- c("Matrix","Array","Data Frame", "List")
Section <- c("\\@ref(matrix)","\\@ref(array)","\\@ref(dataframe)","\\@ref(list)")
d <- data.frame(Type, Section)
knitr::kable(d)
```
